mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TP_COMMENT WHERE TP_SEQ = ${tpSeq} ORDER BY TC_REF DESC, TC_STEP ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TP_COMMENT(TP_SEQ, TC_REF, TC_ID, TC_CONTENT, TC_WRITEDATE) VALUES(${tpSeq}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(TC_REF),0) +1 FROM TP_COMMENT TC), #{tcId}, #{tcContent}, NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE TP_COMMENT SET TC_STEP= TC_STEP + 1 WHERE 1 =1 AND TC_REF = (SELECT TC_REF FROM (SELECT TC_REF FROM TP_COMMENT a WHERE TC_COMMENTSEQ = ${tcCommentSeq}) A) AND TC_STEP > (SELECT TC_STEP FROM (SELECT TC_STEP FROM TP_COMMENT b WHERE TC_COMMENTSEQ = ${tcCommentSeq}) B)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TP_COMMENT(TP_SEQ, TC_ID, TC_REF, TC_STEP, TC_DEPTH, TC_CONTENT, TC_WRITEDATE) VALUES(${tpSeq}, #{tcId}, (SELECT TC_REF FROM TP_COMMENT A WHERE TC_COMMENTSEQ = ${tcCommentSeq}), (SELECT TC_STEP FROM TP_COMMENT B WHERE TC_COMMENTSEQ = ${tcCommentSeq}) + 1, 1, #{tcContent}, NOW());
